Description.Text: Set in a prime location of Adelaide, Ambassadors Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, fax machine, photocopying, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including golf course (within 3 km). For reliable service and professional staff, Ambassadors Hotel caters to your needs.
